name: Stay With You
content: 你们的声音言犹在耳边
或许只是幻觉但感觉你们就在身旁
All the memories of your faces
彷佛昔日  历历在目
And if the walls are closing in
We’ll  nd a window deep within
Till we  nd a way and we’d say
Look what time has held true
Till we  nd a way me and you
Come round I’ll be here, right with you
你们的声音言犹在耳边
或许只是幻觉但感觉你们就在身旁
All the memories of your faces
彷佛昔日  历历在目
And if the walls are closing in
We’ll  nd a window deep within
Till we  nd a way and we’d say
Look what time has held true
Till we  nd a way me and you
Come round I’ll be here, right with you
Till we  nd a way and we’d say
Look what time has held true
Till we  nd a way me and you
We’d gather all our dreams again
We may not all be the same
